name: Star Tech: Deep Space Mine
description:
TLDR

A puzzle-builder, where you build up a multi-ring mining rig around a highly valuable dark crystal to harvest its power and precious minerals.

Full-Description

Using Star Tech’s patented Deep Space Mining technology, a series of interlocking rings are constructed to form the mining rig around Cosmic Crystals. By constructing structures on the various rings of the mining rig, power and precious materials can be harvested from the highly valuable Crystals.

To harvest the Crystal, harvesting structures have to be built in clusters on the rig. The larger the chain of structures, the more resources those structures can harvest. Additionally, specialist workers can be employed to manually harvest materials from structures, useful for harvesting resources from isolated, non-clustered structures. Harvesting precious minerals allows the mining rig to be extended with additional rings.

However, maintaining chains of structures is an on-going challenge. The rings of the mining rig rotate periodically, altering the layout of the mining rig. Structures need replacing periodically, and buildings cost a variety of resources.

How to play

If your POWER (Red) reaches 0, it's game over. MINERALS (Blue) are used to unlock new buildings and upgrade your rig. POPULATION (Green) allows you to play worker cards. 

  • Place buildings adjacent to each other in order for them to harvest the crystal's resources or gain population. The longer the chain, the more resources that are awarded. Be aware of walls that are on the edges of some buildings, as they will block chains.

    Place workers to manually work the buildings. This will allow you to harvest the building's resource without requiring a chain of adjacent buildings. 

    The rings of the mining rig rotate periodically, track their next rotation on the UI top left. The Crystal grows unstable, and shoots out flares periodically. This will destroy buildings.

    Special buildings can be built, which enhance harvesting, impact ring rotation, or prevent the Crystal's flare from destroying buildings. 

    Earn enough precious minerals to unlock new buildings and additional rings for your mining rig.
